findings.description: The lock function overwrites a user's existing PlayerSettings without checking if they already have locked tokens.
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target vulnerability but focuses on a different aspect (overwriting settings) rather than the admin control issue.

findings.description: The contract maintains two separate state variables that can become desynchronized.
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target vulnerability but focuses on a different aspect (state management) rather than the admin control issue.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability (access_control) was not mentioned in any of the findings.

notes: The findings are valid concerns but do not address the target vulnerability of admin control issues. The target vulnerability was not identified in the audit findings.
